greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A051903(n) mod A002322(n), where A051903 gives the maximal prime exponent of n, and A002322 is Carmichael's lambda (also known as psi).
comment: This differs from A051903 at n = 2, 4, 8, 12, 16, 24, 48, 80, 240. Are there any other such n? (None other found <= 201326592.)
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 11 2019
